text: Mitzi Gaynor (born Francesca Marlene de Czanyi von Gerber; September 4, 1931 - October 17, 2024) was an American actress, singer, and dancer. She was known for her roles in There's No Business Like Show Business (1954), The Birds and the Bees (1956), and South Pacific. Gaynor died of natural causes in Los Angeles, California on October 17, 2024, at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American dancers Category:Singers from Chicago Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Mitzi Gaynor
